error.region_not_supported: OAuth2 login is not yet supported for this region.
error.no_auth_code: No authorization code found in the URL. Please make sure you copied the full redirect URL.
error.invalid_state: Security state mismatch. Please try again.
error.oauth_error: Mazda login returned an error. Please try again.
error.token_exchange_failed: Failed to exchange authorization code for tokens. Please try again.

user.description: Select your Mazda Connected Services region.

country.description: Select the country where your MyMazda account is registered.

auth.description:
1. Open this link in your browser and log in with your MyMazda account:

{authorize_url}

2. After logging in, your browser will try to redirect to an address starting with `msauth://...` â€” this will fail (that is expected).

3. Copy the **full URL** from your browser's address bar and paste it below.

send_poi.name: Send POI
send_poi.description: Sends a GPS location to the vehicle's navigation system as a POI (Point of Interest). Requires a navigation SD card installed in the vehicle.

device_id.name: Vehicle
device_id.description: The vehicle to send the GPS location to.

latitude.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::latitude%]
latitude.description: The latitude of the location to send.

longitude.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::longitude%]
longitude.description: The longitude of the location to send.

poi_name.name: POI name
poi_name.description: A friendly name for the location.
